concert: EchoTest at SeaProg 2019

By Anthony Garone

Julie Slick, Marco Machera, and Alessandro Inolti live at the SeaProg 2019 festival.

Find Julie Slick on:

Like what you see here?

I flew out to Seattle to spend some time with Steve Ball and several others for SeaProg 2019. It was a great time and I was able to film a few shows. Here is one of them. This is EchoTest featuring Julie Slick (bass), Marcho Machera (bass and vocals), and Alessandro Inolti (drums) performing a majority of their latest release, Daughter of Ocean.

Performance video

Credits

Music:

  • Julie Slick, bass
  • Marco Machera, bass and vocals
  • Alessandro Inolti, drums

Special thanks to Dennis Rea and the SeaProg crew for letting me film and making my life pretty easy.
